wikipedia_page.main: Peter Clive Rodon (5 February 1945 – July 2000) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as a centre forward.

response: Christopher Peter Rodon (born 9 June 1963) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a striker.
Joseph Peter Rodon (born 22 October 1997) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Tottenham Hotspur and the Wales national team.
